Claim: "A man rides a bicycle while a young girl holds onto the back of him."
Implication: "The man is sitting on the ground."
Referring expressions: A man, young girl, bicycle  Man, ground
Formula: (exists c (exists a (exists b (IsRides(a) and IsHeldBy(b) and IsBicycle(c)))) & (forall f (forall g ( IsRides(f) ->  IsSittingOn(g))))) -> (exists e (exists d (IsSittingOn(d) and IsGround(e))))
